metadata.synopsis: Legendary adventurer Sinbad (Patrick Wayne) stops in a port town to visit his friend Prince Kassim (Damien Thomas), only to find the city walls locked and no one there to greet him except an evil witch, Zenobia (Margaret Whiting), and her monstrous henchmen. Kassim's sister, Princess Farah (Jane Seymour), finds Sinbad and informs him her brother has been transformed into an ape, so now it's up to Sinbad to find the magic shrine that may be the only hope for restoring Kassim to his human form.
metadata.genre: Action & Adventure/Art House & International/Kids & Family/Science Fiction & Fantasy

reviews: The acting largely detracts from the swashbuckling premise, taking viewers out of the fantasy when clunky lines are prattled unenthusiastically.
Kiddie matinee fluff has fun action moments.
One of those great Harrhausen adventure epics that you simply have to catch while you're still 14.
Anything with Ray Harryhausen, and I'm there!
